description.p: You were trained and provisioned to be a guardian to a special place. Whether you were brought up in a family that has always been guardians, or decided to become one out of choice, you are a staunch defender and warrior. Perhaps you guard a temple or sacred site from those who wish to take it. Or, you could have been a member of a royal guard or protected a city from invaders.

When you choose this background, work with your DM to determine what kind of organization you were a part of, how your training was, and what kind of place you swore to protect. Was it an ancient temple dedicated to the gods? Or was it a city which you loved dearly, and would give your life to protect?

ul.li: Equipment: A set of common clothes, a set of medium armor, a simple or martial weapon of your choice, a banner, a ring of keys that go to where you are stationed, and a pouch containing 10 gp

description.p: For those who are guardians, the law and upholding of vows and honor are important, regardless of what, where, or whom you serve. Thus, guardians tend to be those with a firm understanding and respect for rules and structure, while also being people who are strong and brave.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I take great pride in guarding what I have sworn to protect.
While I once had a passion for what I guard, it has been a rather dull experience so far.
I tend to create little stories in my head to occupy my time.
I may adhere to my post with honor and dignity, but I do enjoy a good distraction every now and then.
I tend to enjoy the company of those who adhere to the law.
Protecting the innocent is the most admirable thing that one can do.
I know that the place I defend will play a role of great importance in the events to come.
I guard one who is going to change the world.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Honor. I adhere to the strict rules and requirements of being a guardian. (Lawful)
Sacrifice. I will lay down my life if need be for those that I protect. (Good)
Power. I know how to wield my position to obtain what I want. (Evil)
Determination. I will stop at nothing and will do anything to protect that which I guard. (Chaotic)
Defense. I chose this path, and it is one that I swear to uphold the tenets of. (Lawful)
Protection. I will defend the one I am told to protect. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I am the guardian of an heir to a fallen empire. I will restore them to power, but until then I must keep them hidden and safe.
My closest friends are the priests and priestesses of the temple I protect.
I am the sole surviving guardian of an ancient and forgotten magical structure.
An otherworldly entity instructed me with guarding a portal to their realm.
I uphold the laws and tenets of the city I have vowed to defend.
Through heat and rain and storm, I shall stand as a shield that protects my master.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: Those who break the law are the worst society has to offer, and I show them no pity or remorse.
I often find myself wishing for a life of guarding something more worthwhile.
I donâ€™t often agree with how my charge acts and thinks, to their continuous consternation.
I talk a big game, but deep down I doubt myself constantly.
I am secretly scared of dying for my cause.
I feel as though I will never be seen as worthy by those I protect, and thus I do anything I can to feel as though I have value.

description.p: You have a special position due to your profession as a guardian. Other guardians, regardless of whether or not they work with you or not, recognize your nature as a guardian, and will show their respect. You can also invoke your status as a guardian to gain access to the occasional restricted area, provided that you have not shown yourself to be a threat. Additionally, you can requisition simple equipment from other guardians, so long as they are equipped to do so.
